plot: The Shaolin Monks question common assumptions about pain and resistance to pain. This alternative approach to body and mind is based on the fours elements: self-control, resistance, power, and stances.
title: Shaolin Legend Live
plot_es: The Shaolin Monks question common assumptions about pain and resistance to pain. This alternative approach to body and mind is based on the fours elements: self-control, resistance, power, and stances.
